ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Parse simple '.ini' configuration files to an structured list. Users can manipulate this resulting list with lapply() functions. This same structured list can be used to write back to file after modifications.

Parse simple '.ini' configuration files to an structured list. Users can manipulate this resulting list with lapply() functions. This same structured list can be used to write back to file after modifications.

name: r-ini
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ini
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ini_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ini/ini_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7b191a54019c8c52d6c2211c14878c95564154ec4865f57007953742868cd813

build:
  number: 1007
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ini')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ini')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/dvdscripter/ini
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Parse simple '.ini' configuration files to an structured list. Users can manipulate
    this resulting list with lapply() functions. This same structured list can be used
    to write back to file after modifications.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
